mapper.insert:
SELECT SCOPE_IDENTITY()
insert into Log (TargetMethod, MethodDescription, RequestName, RequestIP, ExceptionCode, ExceptionDetail, CreateBy, CreateDate, RequestUrl, RequestParamter, RequestToken, RequestUserAgent) values (#{targetmethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{methoddescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{requestname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{requestip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{exceptioncode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{exceptiondetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createby,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{requesturl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{requestparamter,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{requesttoken,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{requestuseragent,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update Log set TargetMethod = #{targetmethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MethodDescription = #{methoddescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RequestName = #{requestname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RequestIP = #{requestip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ExceptionCode = #{exceptioncode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ExceptionDetail = #{exceptiondetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CreateBy = #{createby,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CreateDate = #{createdate,jdbcType=DATE}, RequestUrl = #{requesturl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RequestParamter = #{requestparamter,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, RequestToken = #{requesttoken,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RequestUserAgent = #{requestuseragent,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where Id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select Id, TargetMethod, MethodDescription, RequestName, RequestIP, ExceptionCode, ExceptionDetail, CreateBy, CreateDate, RequestUrl, RequestParamter, RequestToken, RequestUserAgent from Log where Id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select Id, TargetMethod, MethodDescription, RequestName, RequestIP, ExceptionCode, ExceptionDetail, CreateBy, CreateDate, RequestUrl, RequestParamter, RequestToken, RequestUserAgent from Log order by age desc,username asc
